word_mean: 盘形刀：一种牙科器械，整个刀片呈环形，用来雕刻牙模
盘形挖器：牙科用来挖除龋牙质

sentence.Network_en: Cupule discoid , 4 - 8 mm 1.5 - 2.5 cm, enclosing basal part of nut.
sentence.Network_cn: 壳斗浅碟状, 高 4-8 毫米,宽1.5-2.5厘米, 包著坚果基部.

sentence.Network_en: Conclution: MRI examination is valuable in diagnosis of discoid meniscus.
sentence.Network_cn: 结论: MRI诊断盘状半月板及其继发病变具有很高的价值.

sentence.Network_en: Meniscal tears and degeneration are very common findings in discoid menisci.
sentence.Network_cn: 盘状半月板常并发半月板变性或撕裂.

PerfectNetExp.abs: 也称为柱状液晶, 以一个个的液晶来说, 它是长的像碟状(disk), 但是其排列就像是柱状(discoid).  如果我们是依分子量的高低来分的话.

英语新词汇与常用词汇的翻译(D) ... discohere 失去连贯性 discoid 铁饼状的 discolor 变色.
地质学专业英语词汇(36) ... 盘星石 Discoaster 盘状 discoid 盘状核粒 discolith.

discoidal ①盘状的②中域的discoidal cleavage 盘状卵裂discoidal division 盘状卵裂

有关血液检查的ANA质 ... 1. 脸颊蝴蝶斑（ malar rash） 2. 圆盘状的红斑（ discoid rash） 3. 皮肤对光敏感（ photosensitivity）.

derivation.yuyuan_name: late 18th cent.: from Greek diskoeidēs, from diskos (see discus)

auth_sentence.content: There is also a simple form called discoid lupus that affects just the skin.
